text:
hahahahaha Android Studio :joy_cat:
Error:(39, 0) ProductFlavor names cannot start with 'test'

I think the feasibility of Andy's latest question can be discovered by simply talking through each user's experience. How does player 1 find player 2? How do we know when both players are ready to start the game? If the players stop communicating, what happens to the game? Etc.
With the custom code version he mentioned, or something like it, would that be anything that affects us on the framework/app side? Or is it all web experience?
sorry, "custom code" being the code generated to share with a friend.
It looks like all web experience to me (at least there is nothing I know of that needs to access smartphone hardware in order to work)
